name: Personal Website

name: Graphics Engine
desc: A simple graphics engine created from scratch in C. Supports several 3D shapes as well as lighting using ray tracing.

name: Project Angstrom

name: Fit Conduit
desc: An android app that finds the number of cables that can fit into a conduit.
